params.tokenAddress: The address of the protocol token.

newPendingSpend(uint256,address).details: A pending spend occurs when an ad is queued but has not been displayed yetPending spend is held in escrow. Neither the campaign nor the integrator can withdraw it

params.amount: The amount to be allocated as pending.

returns._0: The new pending balance for the campaign.

spendCompleted(uint256,address,address).details: Reallocate pending funds held in escrow to available for withdraw by the integrator

returns._0: The new actual balance for the campaign.

campaignWithdraw(uint256).notice: Executes a campaign funding withdraw, transfering tokens to the assigned campaign withdraw address.
